txt.en: 'The valley to the south is a dangerous place. Proceed with caution if you must go that way!'
'I hate to think what would happen to the northern lands if we didn't have this barricade.'
'This is not a place for those who lack courage. You need to be strong.'
'You haven't seen any spiders around, have you? I hate those things.'
'One day the Road will be clear, and travellers will pass this way without fear. One day.'
'If you are seeking a place of refuge, head north. There you will find the great outpost of Gondamon.'
'Goblins. If I never see another goblin again, I'll know that our efforts here were not wasted.'
'These are dark times. All good people must stand together if we are to survive.'
'If this barricade is overrun, there will be little defence for my people. It must not happen.'
